cornerscircle.pro


NAME: cornerscircle PURPOSE: get corners of circle of diameter d center xcen,ycen EXPLANATION: CALLING SEQUENCE INPUTS: d - diameter of circle xcen - center x ycen - center y OUTPUT: corners of rectangle cw from upper left corner, (e.g. when at 0 angle) array "corners" METHOD: REVISION HISTORY: 10Nov26 Jeff Rich created

top cornerscircle

result = cornerscircle(d, xcen, ycen)

Parameters

d
xcen
ycen
